Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by Colorado in 2020...
Traded from Colorado to St. Louis (C) on 3/2/2020 (Going to STL: SS Thomas Garraway. Going to COL: RF Nathan Pritchett)...
Injured on 5/7/2020 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Brooklyn on 4/21/2021 (Going to STL: 3B Fede Alfaro. Going to BRO: SS Thomas Garraway)...
Injured on 7/7/2021 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/30/2022 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/11/2022, off Thomas Winsor (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/11/2022, off James Moynihan (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2024, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
